application.description: Application description table storing all metadata, specs, relationships, behaviours, resource requirements, and QoS goals.

application_id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

arguments.description: Arguments passed to the application container.

relationships.description: Relationships such as volumes, other containers, and node selectors.

behaviour.description: Deployment strategy and orchestration behaviour (type, replicas, restart policy, cron, etc.).

security_config.description: Secrets, credentials, keys, and firewall rules.

instance_type.description: Type of instance: General or Optimised (CPU/RAM/Storage/GPU).

num_cpu.description: Number of CPUs required (exact or range).

security_rules.description: Firewall/security rules including whitelists and ports.

max_price.description: Maximum price user is willing to pay for resource unit.

location.description: Preferred location of resource (continent, country, city, GPS).

pref_resource_provider.description: Preferred specific providers with weights (e.g., Amazon 70%, Azure 50%).

minimise_power_usage.description: Indicates if power usage should be minimised.

energy_budget.description: Energy budget in kWh per hour.

minimise_cost.description: Indicates if cost should be minimised.

custom_scaling_rules.description: Custom scaling rules (overrides AI decision making in case of conflict).

resource_quota_id.description:
Note:

id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

capacity.description: Capacity description table storing all attributes defined in orchestration capacity model.

capacity_id.description:
Note:
This is a Primary Key.<pk/>

resource_provider.description: The provider of the resources, where they run (e.g., Amazon, Azure, UoW, Sztaki, edge provider).

capacity_provider.description: The provider of the capacity (e.g., ACME Corporation).

resource_type.description: The type of resource: Cloud or Edge.

instance_types.description: Supported instance types and specifications (CPU, RAM, storage).

resource_quota.description: Available capacity as CPU/RAM/Memory quota. Either use resource_quota or instance_quota.

instance_quota.description: Available capacity as number of instances. Either use resource_quota or instance_quota.

price.description: Price for resource usage (based on instance type, utilisation, or entire edge device).

locality.description: Geographic location(s) of resources: continent, country, city, GPS. Multiple values possible.

operating_system.description: Supported operating systems with IDs (limited to Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS).

energy_type.description: Type of energy used: Green, Brown, Mix.

powered_type.description: Power source type: Battery powered or Mains powered.

energy_consumption.description: Energy demand based on instance type, CPU/memory usage, or edge device.

accessible_sensors.description: Sensors accessible through local network from edge machine.

devices.description: Details of additional devices (e.g., Hardware: GPU, Software: CUDA).

mobility.description: Indicates whether the device is mobile (true/false).

security_ports.description: List of ports that the resource allows to be opened.

trust.description: Trust level of the resource (definition TBD).

access_credentials.description: Credentials for accessing the resource (e.g., SSH keys).

network_access.description: Network access type: Public / Private / Community.
